title: How Mirka Caught a Fish
description: Welcome back to Hereville, where Mirka, the time-traveling, monster-fighting, Orthodox Jewish girl faces her greatest challenge yet: babysitting! Mirka wants to find new adventures, but she's stuck having to watch her disapproving little sister. Add a magic fish with a grudge, and Mirka's in way over her head--and this time, her whole family is in danger!
author: Barry  Deutsch
